name: Sunny Meadows
description:
Repus starts his journey worried, but the beautiful weather and 
singing birds give him hope and motivation to push forward.

name: Twilight Path
description:
After collecting the first key out of six, Repus thinks the 
journey will be easy—if only he knew what was ahead…

name: Stormy Road
description:
The weather is making Repus' journey much harder than 
he expected, but he won’t let a little lightning stop him.

name: Ghostly Night
description:
The sun has completely disappeared. Repus begins to think he’s 
seeing ghosts. Is it just his imagination playing tricks on him?

name: Eye of the Chaos
description:
The storm has reached its peak, rain and lightning fill the air. 
Even dragons have appeared. Is this the end of Repus journey?

name: Dark Cave
description:
Now in a dark cave, Repus is away from the rain, but the 
dangers here are just as deadly. Can he still free Hcaep?
